channel.title: CVE Feed for OSNEXUS -- QuantaStor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSNEXUS -- QuantaStor

item.title: CVE-2021-42083|2024-10-16T11:52:21.724Z -- osnexus -- quantastor
item.description: An authenticated attacker is able to create alerts that trigger a stored XSS attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-42080|2024-10-16T11:52:21.466Z -- osnexus -- quantastor
item.description: An attacker is able to launch a Reflected XSS attack using a crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-42079|2024-10-16T11:52:21.236Z -- osnexus -- quantastor
item.description: An authenticated administrator is able to prepare an alert that is able to execute an SSRF attack. This is exclusively with POST requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-42081|2024-10-16T11:52:20.991Z -- osnexus -- quantastor
item.description: An authenticated administrator is allowed to remotely execute arbitrary shell commands via the API.

item.title: CVE-2021-4406|2024-10-16T11:52:20.710Z -- osnexus -- quantastor
item.description: An administrator is able to execute commands as root via the alerts management dialog

item.title: CVE-2021-42082|2024-10-16T11:52:20.458Z -- osnexus -- quantastor
item.description: Local users are able to execute scripts under root privileges.
